pages.title: Crystal Gardens
pages.text: Lakes of $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$() and giant $(l:dimension/hummingstone)crystalline structures$() define its look.

The ground is covered with a small layer of soil. Not much, but more than enough to be covered with a thick carpet of moss. The many natural light sources in this biome allow plants to grow here that you might find on the surface, unlike most other biomes.

pages.title: Nephrite Blossoms
pages.text: Little trees, as big as they get down here - more like a big bush. ...or giant shrub.\Eeeeh, details.\\Their fruit isn't made of glass, but it shimmers very much like it would be. They are very tasty too.\Eating one will give you a short burst of [#](449900)Toughness[#](), which reduces the damage you take from hard attacks. They can also be $(l:cuisine/infused_beverages)fermented$() and $(l:brewing/potion_workshop_brewing)used to brew potions$().

pages.title: Jadeite Blossoms
pages.text: Imposing vines are hanging from the high ceiling and break through the darkness with their light. They are very tasty and can be used as a $(l:brewing/potion_workshop_reagents)Potion Reagent$().
